channel.title: [CRITICAL] How to stop people teleporting in combat? [CRITICAL]
channel.description:
Well, at least I think this is critical.
I want to know how you can stop people from teleporting in combat, such as when fighting another player in the wilderness, or fighting a npc.
Example. -Player wants to fight another player at hills -Player attacks other player -The other player retaliates, leading to him attacking back -Both players are in combat -Player types ::home, and automatically teleports home even though he is in combat.
How can I fix this?
Thank you very much, Jackson.

item.title: [CRITICAL] How to stop people teleporting in combat? [CRITICAL]
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:335794”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=432176.msg3172973#msg3172973 date=1270583777]

if(!isInCombat)
{
     toX = x;
     toY = y;
}

[/quote]
^ Correct ^

Tele block the person.

and the code is this else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("client")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3298; teleportToY = 3315; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You teleport to Client Shop."); } } It reads "if you do ::client and you are teleblocked then sendmessage A magical force stops you from teleporting, if your not then teleport to X,Y.

^ This is allstar you dick… ^[/quote]

Yes it is… and your point?? I was saying if you have allstar thats the best you are going to be able to do…Because I can’t get anything else to wor

Read full topic
item.source: [CRITICAL] How to stop people teleporting in combat? [CRITICAL]

and the code is this else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("client")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3298; teleportToY = 3315; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You teleport to Client Shop."); } } It reads "if you do ::client and you are teleblocked then sendmessage A magical force stops you from teleporting, if your not then teleport to X,Y.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

What is your source? If you have an allstar I dont think you can. Because for the buttons to work they need the command. And I don’t think (Correct me if i’m wrong) you can make it so you can’t tele away using a command.

Read full topic

item.title: [CRITICAL] How to stop people teleporting in combat? [CRITICAL]
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

But that’s for when somebody has casted the ‘Teleblock’ spell on you.

I want it so you can’t teleport out when in combat, but as soon as you are out of combat/the fight is over, you can teleport.

With teleblock, you are unable to teleport at all.

Read full topic
